examples.example: 我在这所环境优美的学院里度过了充实又快乐的时光。

translate.english: I spent a fulfilling and happy time in this college with a beautiful environment.

examples.example: 我很荣幸能在这所充满学术氛围的学院里不断提升自己。

translate.english: I am very honored to continuously improve myself in this college full of academic atmosphere.

examples.example: 我在朝气蓬勃的学院中积极进取，不断追求着自己的梦想。

translate.english: I am making progress actively in the vibrant college and constantly pursuing my own dream.
